welcome_message_body: "Welcome to charming Rodenbach, a quaint town known for its natural beauty and rich history. We invite you to immerse yourself in our culture, taste our delicious cuisine, and discover all that our lovely city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Reichelsheim Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for regional and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Frankfurt-Egelsbach Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Frankfurt-Egelsbach Airport, primarily used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Frankfurt International Airport, serving a wide range of airlines and destinations.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The second terminal at Frankfurt International Airport, primarily used by Lufthansa and its partner airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The newest terminal at Frankfurt International Airport, currently under construction and set to open in 2023.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, with a 24-hour time limit per device.
